citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 am on 25 April
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Failure to provide access to the facility,
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in
enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:30 am on 25 April 
2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by phone. Failure to provide access to the facility, 
animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result in 
enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
